Display.name: Pisces
Display.lore: He wears a sky-blue flare dress lined with white. Mirrored on both hands, each of five nails is painted a different pastel color. Mascaraed lashes frame his doe eyes. Most notably, white cat-ears protrude from his blonde hair.

Display.name: Knight of Cydonia
Display.lore: After years of service in the Cydonian sands, the martian sand has visibly gnawed at his armor.
